spatial_accuracy.notes: 1.1 Layout Topology: Room count does not match. Plan has Kitchen, Dining Room, Living Room, Bathroom. Render has 4 distinct rooms that do not map directly to the plan, plus an additional entrance area. Dining Room and Living Room are combined in the render. Bathroom layout is significantly different. (0/10) 1.2 Wall Geometry: Wall positions are completely different from the plan. Many walls present in the render are not in the plan, and vice versa. Corner angles are preserved for the square structure but internally inconsistent with the plan. (0/10) 1.3 Openings - Doors: Only 3 doors are clearly visible in the render, compared to 5 in the plan (including the inaccessible entrance door in the plan). Placement is incorrect relative to the plan's room structure. Swing direction for the bathroom door in the plan is outward, but inward in the render. (0/10) 1.4 Openings - Windows: Number of windows does not match. Plan has 4 windows, render has 5. Placement is incorrect due to completely different wall layouts. (0/5) 1.5 Dimensional Scaling: Inapplicable due to fundamental layout differences. (0/5)

structural_fidelity.notes: 2.1 Cutaway View Compliance: Roof is removed, interior walls are visible. (3/5) 2.2 Completeness: Many rooms and structural elements (e.g., the U-shaped staircase) from the plan are missing or fundamentally altered. (0/5) 2.3 Hallucination Control: Numerous extra walls, rooms, and a completely different staircase are added. This is a complete hallucination of the floor plan structure. (0/5) 2.4 UI/Annotation Cleanliness: 'SAMPLE FLOOR PLAN' text is prominently displayed on an interior wall. (0/5) 2.5 Presentation Context: Dark neutral background is present, model is floating. However, the background is not fully black/gray gradient, and there's a visible ground plane under the model (though it does not extend to infinity). (2/5)

furniture_mapping.notes: 3.1 Furniture Presence: Kitchen fixtures (stove, fridge, sink, counter) from the plan are completely missing. Only random furniture is placed, with a different layout of common living room/dining room items. Bathroom fixtures (toilet, sink) are present, but their layout and type differ significantly from the plan (basin toilet vs. standard toilet). The staircase is of a completely different design. (0/5) 3.2 Furniture Accuracy: Placement does not match the 2D plan as the underlying architectural structure is incorrect. Scale is somewhat appropriate, but irrelevant given the mapping failure. (0/5)

aesthetic_quality.notes: 4.1 Geometry Style: Not low-poly, but not high-res either. Surfaces are generally flat shaded. Objects have some detail (e.g., bathroom fixtures, furniture handles). Textures are present on walls (subtle noise/imperfection) and furniture, violating the 'solid flat colors only' rule. (3/10) 4.2 Lighting & Rendering: Lighting is ambient, but shadows are more pronounced than 'minimal'. Colors are distinguishable, but material properties go beyond 'flat shading'. (6/10) 4.3 Camera & Composition: The view appears to be truly isometric and roughly 45-degree rotated. Framing is centered, and all rooms are visible. (5/5)

detected_errors.description: Entire room layouts (Kitchen, Dining, Living) fundamentally changed and reconfigured, effectively missing the original rooms.
Hallucinated an entirely new floor plan, including different room segmentation, wall placement, and staircase design.
Text 'SAMPLE FLOOR PLAN' present on an interior wall.
Significant hallucination and misplacement of furniture and fixtures due to underlying architectural changes.
Materials and textures are used on walls and furniture, violating the 'solid flat colors only' rule.

summary: This render is an instant fail due to fundamental errors in structural and spatial accuracy, completely hallucinating the floor plan and displaying text annotations.
